AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Raymond McMillon: defendant, appellant, and passenger in a tractor-trailer with undocumented aliens, convicted of alien transportation offenses, traveled with co-defendant to Laredo, questioned by Agent Pena at an immigration checkpoint, filed a motion to dismiss the indictment on speedy trial grounds
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena: Border Patrol Agent who approached the driver-side door at an immigration checkpoint near Freer, Texas, questioned Williams and McMillon, discovered a person hidden in the tractor's sleeper area, testified as a government witness during the jury trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Manuel Hernandez: Border Patrol Agent who prepared to have his canine perform a sniff of the tractor-trailer's exterior, worked with Agent Pena during the stop, testified as a government witness during the jury trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: undocumented alien transported by McMillon, testified as a government witness during the jury trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: undocumented alien transported by McMillon, testified as a government witness during the jury trial
